channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US senators demand answers from X, Meta, Alphabet and others on sexualized deepfakes
item.description: In a letter to the leaders of X, Meta, Alphabet, Snap, Reddit and TikTok, several U.S. senators are demanding the companies provide proof that they ha...

item.title: Mira Murati’s startup, Thinking Machines Lab, is losing two of its co-founders to OpenAI
item.description: The abrupt change in personnel was in the works for several weeks, according to an OpenAI executive.

item.title: How one startup is using probiotics to try and ease the copper shortage
item.description: Transition Metal Solutions is applying a special cocktail to coax microbes into unlocking more copper from ore.

item.title: Spotify raises its subscription prices in the U.S. again
item.description: Spotify's new price for its individual plan is $12.99 per month

item.title: Microsoft taps India’s Varaha for durable carbon removal offtake
item.description: Microsoft is buying over 100,000 tons of carbon dioxide removal credits from India's Varaha over the next three years.

item.title: Lizn Hearpieces Review: Affordable but Uncomfortable Hearing Aids
item.description: These odd-looking hearing aids double as solid earbuds, but comfort is a major issue.

item.title: Parloa triples its valuation in 8 months to $3B with $350M raise
item.description: The massive round was led by existing investor General Catalyst, with participation from other returning backers.

item.title: Wikipedia’s Existential Threats Feel Greater Than Ever
item.description: As the free online encyclopedia turns 25, it’s facing political opposition, AI scraping, dwindling volunteers, and a public that may no longer believe...

item.title: Wikimedia Foundation announces new AI partnerships with Amazon, Meta, Microsoft, Perplexity and others
item.description: The AI partnerships allow companies to access the org's content, like Wikipedia, at scale.

item.title: Our Favorite Coway Air Purifiers Are on Sale (2026)
item.description: Breathe easier with these discounts on one of WIRED’s favorite air purifier brands, including an option for large rooms.
